prompts.name: Frequent Changes in Auditors
keywords: rotation of audit partners more frequently than usual
prompts.context: Any mention of audit firm changes outside standard rotation.

prompts.name: Nervous, Unresponsive, or Evasive Management
keywords: further details will be provided at a later date
prompts.context: Primarily from Q&A transcripts. Tone/Semantic Cues: Hesitation, avoidance of direct questions, repetition of non-committal phrases, significant pauses in speech (if transcripts include timings).

prompts.name: High Turnover or Loss of Key Staff
Sudden Departure of Key Executives or Board Directors
Adverse Audit Opinions or Disclaimer of Opinion
prompts.context: LLM needs to identify the type of audit opinion issued.

prompts.name: Going Concern Warning in Audit Reports
keywords: material uncertainty related to going concern
doubt about the entity's ability to continue as a going concern

prompts.name: Credit Rating Downgrade
keywords: credit rating revised downwards by [rating agency]

prompts.name: Stock Price Declines or Rising Debt Costs
Increasing Wholesale or Retail Funding Costs
Rapid Asset Growth, Especially with Volatile Liabilities
Growing Concentrations in Assets or Liabilities
keywords: high reliance on a few large depositors/funders

prompts.name: Deviation from Traditional Business Model
keywords: new business lines with limited experience

prompts.name: Deterioration in Product/Service Quality
keywords: loss of market share due to quality issues

prompts.name: Unexplained Movements in "Other Assets" or "Other Liabilities"
keywords: Significant increase/decrease in 'other assets/liabilities' without clear explanation

prompts.name: Fair Value Adjustments on Financial Instruments
Increased Off-Balance Sheet (OBS) Items and Risks
Declining Funding and Lending Activities
prompts.context: Indicates a potential tightening of funding or reduced demand for credit, signaling a less healthy fiscal situation.

prompts.name: Unclear Financial Performance Indicators
prompts.context: Phrases that may indicate ambiguous, unclear, or potentially concerning trends in earnings, costs, net interest income (NII), or return on investment, which could mask underlying issues or signal a shift in financial health.

prompts.name: Structural or Operational Risk
prompts.context: Suggests underlying risks related to the cost structure or inherent operational aspects of the business.

prompts.name: Cross-Border Business Exposure
prompts.context: Indicates exposure or activities related to international transactions or specific geographic (border) risks.

prompts.name: Foreign Exchange and Funding Impacts
prompts.context: Combines foreign exchange dynamics with a decline in deposits, which could suggest challenges related to currency fluctuations impacting funding.
